# Tablas - Sexo


```{r echo = FALSE}
tab <- data %>%
     tab_prepend_names() %>% 
     tab_cols(total(),DC02) %>% 
	tab_cells() %>%
	tab_stat_cpct() %>%
     tab_cells() %>% 
     tab_stat_mean_sd_n() %>% 
     tab_pivot() %>% 
	tab_caption('')
as.datatable_widget(tab, width=900)
```
